Class ClientConsole

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.ocsf.client.AbstractClient
      • common.ClientConsole
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ClientConsole
extends AbstractClient
    The handler of the sending and receiving data to/from Server (LAB6).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClientConsole(java.lang.String host, int port)
      By constructing new instance of the ClientConsole, the connection to the Server will be created.
